  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sledovi preteklosti v domači pokrajini</string>
            <string language="en">Traces of past in the neighbourhood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verfolgt von letztem in der Nachbarschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trace de passé dans le voisinage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segue de passado na vizinhança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segue di passato nella vicinanza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ίχνη παρελθόντος στη γειτονιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rastrea de último en la vecindad</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kaj nas v domačem kraju spominja na pretklost.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of objects (buildings, souvenirs, excavations, ...) that remind us on our past.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">preteklost</string>
            <string language="en">past</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stavba</string>
            <string language="en">building</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">grad</string>
            <string language="en">castle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izkopanina</string>
            <string language="en">excavation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">predmet</string>
            <string language="en">object</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Nachrichten (Gebäude, Andenken, 
Aushöhlungen...) die uns auf unserer Vergangenheit erinnern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des objets (bâtiments, souvenirs, 
excavations...) qui nous rappellent notre passé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação dos objetos (edifícios, 
lembranças, escavações...) que nos lembram em nosso passado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione degli oggetti (costruzioni, ricordi,
scavi...) che ci ricordano sulla nostra esperienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των αντικειμένων (κτήρια, αναμνηστικά, 
ανασκαφές...) που υπενθυμίζουν σε μας στο παρελθόν μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de los objetos (edificios, 
recuerdos, excavaciones...) que nos recuerdan en nuestro pasado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hinter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebäude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schloß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aushöhlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">après</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">após</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">edifício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
